Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]

definition: to sit an entrance exam for a graduate program
to sit for the second round of a two-stage exam
to join the faculty of one's alma mater upon graduation/to remain at school during vacation
to accept an applicant (prospective student, employee etc) who passes an entrance exam/to admit (a student)/to hire (a job candidate)
to postpone one's graduation (e.g. by undertaking additional studies) (abbr. for 延後畢業|延后毕业[yan2 hou4 bi4 ye4])
to pass a university entrance exam
